name: Real Estate
description: Real estate industry focused on property sales and rentals
greetingTemplates: Hi {name}! Thanks for reaching out. I'm your GrowEasy real estate assistant. Could you share which city/location you're looking for?
Hello {name}! Welcome to GrowEasy Realtors. How can I assist you with your property search today?
Hi {name}! I'm your GrowEasy property consultant. What kind of property are you looking for?
fallbackMessages: I haven't heard back from you. Are you still interested in finding your dream property?
Just checking in - I'm still here to help with your property search if you have any questions.
Would you like me to send you some property options based on what we've discussed so far?
